channel.title: Shops dont take coins from buying!
channel.description:
Hey all i am using Demise pk 5 (http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,446621.0.html) I decided to make a economy server off it. But i added few shops and then i saw that if you buy something that is 10k and you have 100k. after you buyed it you got the item and still 100k. so it only say that it is 10k , but it remove no cash. My client.java download link, http://www.mediafire.com/?vmd8f3ojmixdyb8 (if needed)
Hope someone can help me! i give credits to him in my server xD.

item.title: Shops dont take coins from buying!
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

[quote=“RuneSpace, post:4, topic:367379”]Im going to sleep now

When i wake up i will do it for you, just give me the ID of pkpoint shop

bye.[/quote]

id of the shop is :
if(NPCID == 2790){
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 1;

Read full topic
item.source: Shops dont take coins from buying!

item.title: Shops dont take coins from buying!
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

[quote=“RuneSpace, post:3, topic:367379”][quote author=youridudock link=topic=463548.msg3391017#msg3391017 date=1288921398]

Hopefully this will work

http://uppit.com/4tmaonnh5hcb/client.java

Thank you bro! worked , but do you also now how to make the hit 10x and the hp 10x? just like in rs? XD
[/quote]

Umm, pretty sure its Mainly client sided, i cant help with that[/quote]

Ok, But i have a other problem xD My pkshop dont work anymore , He just take coins now , No pkpoints… if you cant fix that i will make commands for those items but that will be a little ugly’r xD

Read full topic

item.title: Shops dont take coins from buying!
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Sell item has already been defined, you need to delete your old sellItem boolean.

Read full topic
